description: Chichi is very protective over the well being of her family, and wishes to remove them from http://anidb.net/ch2103 [Gokuu]`s lifestyle of fighting and constant conflict. As the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch11411 [Gyuumaou] (Ox-King), she is very strong in her own right, having easily made it to the quarter-finals of the 23rd Tenkaichi Budoukai.
name: Chichi
